item.title: Need Help With Something Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

Titles2 is for staff and donator
Titles is Pk Title and then username

yell("+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"): " command.substring(5));

So can you help?

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Something Please Help!

item.title: Need Help With Something Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

There are a few misplaced brackets at the start.

Also, if you actually indented your code properly, bracket errors would be obvious.

Oh, and what’s going on in this code?

yell("+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"): " command.substring(5));

Should be more like this:

yell( "(" + titles2 + titles + " " + playerName + "): " + command.substring(5) );

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Something Please Help!

item.title: Need Help With Something Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

[quote=“Mariokillu, post:2, topic:372227”]You forgot a bracket at the end

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String titles = ""; { if (pkpoints <= 0) { titles = "Beginner"; } { titles = "Beginner"; } if (pkpoints >= 50) { titles = "Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 100) { titles = "Private"; } if (pkpoints >= 150) { titles = "Leading Private"; } if (pkpoints >= 200) { titles = "Officer"; } if (pkpoints >= 250) { titles = "Master Officer"; } if (pkpoints >= 300) { titles = "Head Officer"; } if (pkpoints >= 350) { titles = "Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 400) { titles = "Master Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 450) { titles = "Head Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 500) { titles = "KickAss"; } if (pkpoints >= 550) { titles = "BadAss"; } if (pkpoints >= 600) { titles = "Legend"; } if (pkpoints >= 700) { titles = "Champion"; } if (pkpoints >= 800) { titles = "Pking Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 900) { titles = "Pking Marshal"; } if (pkpoints >= 1000) { titles = "Pking Grand Marshal"; } if (pkpoints >= 1150) { titles = "Beast Of Pk"; } if (pkpoints >= 1300) { titles = "Beastly Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 1500) { titles = "InSane"; } if (pkpoints >= 1700) { titles = "Ultimate Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 2000) { titles = "Pking Jesus"; } if (pkpoints >= 2500) { titles = "Godly Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 3000) { titles = "Pro Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 4000) { titles = "God Of Pking"; } if (donator == 1) { { titles2 = "Donator"; } if (pkpoints >= 3000) { titles2 = "Mod"; } if (playerRights == 2) { { titles2 = "Admin"; } if (playerRights == 3) { { titles2 = "Owner"; } yell("+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"): " command.substring(5)); } } else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && pkpoints <= 0){ } }[/quote]

Nop Still Get Errors

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Something Please Help!

item.title: Need Help With Something Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

You forgot a bracket at the end

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String titles = ""; { if (pkpoints <= 0) { titles = "Beginner"; } { titles = "Beginner"; } if (pkpoints >= 50) { titles = "Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 100) { titles = "Private"; } if (pkpoints >= 150) { titles = "Leading Private"; } if (pkpoints >= 200) { titles = "Officer"; } if (pkpoints >= 250) { titles = "Master Officer"; } if (pkpoints >= 300) { titles = "Head Officer"; } if (pkpoints >= 350) { titles = "Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 400) { titles = "Master Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 450) { titles = "Head Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 500) { titles = "KickAss"; } if (pkpoints >= 550) { titles = "BadAss"; } if (pkpoints >= 600) { titles = "Legend"; } if (pkpoints >= 700) { titles = "Champion"; } if (pkpoints >= 800) { titles = "Pking Captain"; } if (pkpoints >= 900) { titles = "Pking Marshal"; } if (pkpoints >= 1000) { titles = "Pking Grand Marshal"; } if (pkpoints >= 1150) { titles = "Beast Of Pk"; } if (pkpoints >= 1300) { titles = "Beastly Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 1500) { titles = "InSane"; } if (pkpoints >= 1700) { titles = "Ultimate Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 2000) { titles = "Pking Jesus"; } if (pkpoints >= 2500) { titles = "Godly Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 3000) { titles = "Pro Pker"; } if (pkpoints >= 4000) { titles = "God Of Pking"; } if (donator == 1) { { titles2 = "Donator"; } if (pkpoints >= 3000) { titles2 = "Mod"; } if (playerRights == 2) { { titles2 = "Admin"; } if (playerRights == 3) { { titles2 = "Owner"; } yell("+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"): " command.substring(5)); } } else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && pkpoints <= 0){ } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help With Something Please Help!

item.title: Need Help With Something Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Eater Soul Eater
item.description:
@Soul_Eater wrote:

Hello,

Im trying to add a “Yell” Command but i get errors how can i fix this

This is my “Yell” Command

        if (command.startsWith("yell")) {
            String titles = "";

{
if (pkpoints <= 0)
{
titles = “Beginner”;
}
{
titles = “Beginner”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 50)
{
titles = “Pker”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 100)
{
titles = “Private”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 150)
{
titles = “Leading Private”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 200)
{
titles = “Officer”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 250)
{
titles = “Master Officer”;
}

{

}

}

{

}

{

}

{

}

}

{

}

{
titles = “InSane”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 1700)
{
titles = “Ultimate Pker”;
}

{
titles = “Pking Jesus”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 2500)
{

}
if (pkpoints >= 3000)
{
titles = “Pro Pker”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 4000)
{
titles = “God Of Pking”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
{
titles2 = “Donator”;
}
if (pkpoints >= 3000)
{
titles2 = “Mod”;
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
{
titles2 = “Admin”;
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
{
titles2 = “Owner”;
}
yell("+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +"): " command.substring(5));
}
}
else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && pkpoints <= 0){
}

Thanks!

PS: Can somewane help me to add a command that i can ban people from yell Thanks!
